example.code:
$s3ACL = Get-S3ACL -BucketName 's3casetestbucket' -key 'initialize.ps1' $s3ACL.Owner
DisplayName Id ----------- -- testusername 9988776a6554433d22f1100112e334acb45566778899009e9887bd7f66c5f544
$s3ACL.Grants
Grantee Permission ------- ---------- Amazon.S3.Model.S3Grantee FULL_CONTROL
example.description: The command gets the details of the object owner and the permissions granted on the S3 object.
